kpi.name: flng_407a

kpi_info.title: Delete Indirect Data Forward received attempts
kpi_info.use: This KPI shows the number of GTP-C v2 delete indirect data forward request messages received. Delete Indirect Data Forward Request received: - S11/S4 interface (MME/SGSN -> SGW)

kpi.kpi_alias: Del Ind Data FW rcv att
